duties_responsibilities.duty: Produce and execute exceptional concept design work aligned with guidance from the Concept Lead and Art Director.
Develop inspirational digital paintings conveying mood, tone, and artistic direction.
Collaborate with various departments to troubleshoot visual and graphical demands.
Acquire proficiency in proprietary tool sets related to in-house engine and technologies.
Manage multiple assignments with differing completion deadlines concurrently.
Engage in constructive collaboration including idea sharing, giving and receiving critiques, and potential mentorship within the Concept department.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree (BA or BFA) in Fine Art, Concept Art, or a related field
